PerfectNetExp.abs: 欢迎访问奥科蒂约(Ocotillo)黄页伊登走近美国 » 通过邮编浏览奥科蒂约(Ocotillo)黄页 1.Berry B 2.Sines Pegge 3.Sines Pegge 4.Ed.
与近缘的墨西哥刺木(ocotillo)一样，叶小，早落，靠绿色枝条行光合作用。臃肿的树干基部通常中空，成为蜜蜂筑窝之处。
老冬儿的博客 -... ... 有叶子的时候( from internet) 墨西哥刺木( ocotillo) 仙人掌国家公园( Saguaro National Park).

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: via American Spanish (diminutive form) from Nahuatl ocotl 'torch'

means.word_mean: 1. desert shrub of southwestern United States and Mexico having slender naked spiny branches that after the rainy season put forth foliage and clusters of red flowers

auth_sentence.content: The ocotillo plant only grows leaves after it has rained - as soon as the soil dries out, they all drop off.
auth_sentence.res_content: The ocotillo plant only grows leaves after it has rained - as soon as the soil dries out, they all drop off.
